tradeAmendments.notes: Contract data may be incomplete: Larry Fitzgerald ($135, 2011). The agreed-to version of this trade attached the following condition to the 3rd round draft pick: conditionally upgrades to a 2nd round draft pick should Patrick win a 2011 playoff game. Patrick lost in the semifinals so it remained a 3rd rounder.

Contract data may be incomplete: Hakeem Nicks ($28, 2011); Tim Tebow ($12, 2012). The agreed-to version of this trade attached the following condition to the 4th round draft pick: conditionally upgrades to a 3rd round draft pick should John win a 2011 playoff game. John didn't make the playoffs so it remained a 4th rounder.

Contract data may be incomplete: Ray Rice ($250, 2011). The agreed-to version of this trade attached the following condition to the 2nd round draft pick: conditionally downgrades to a 3rd round draft pick should Patrick win a 2011 playoff game. It also attached the following condition to the 3rd round draft pick: conditionally downgrades to a 4th round draft pick should John win a 2011 playoff game. Patrick lost in the semifinals and John didn't make the playoffs so the picks remained 2nd and 3rd rounders, respectively.

Contract data may be incomplete: Deshaun Watson ($31, 2019). The 2022 picks involved in this trade should not have been available to Quinn to trade in 2019. It was erroneously approved by the commissioner but not definitively ruled a mistake until it was seen as too late to roll back.

tradeCashCorrections.notes: The agreed-to version of this trade moved the $20 from Keyon to Mitch in 2025, not 2026. The transaction was incorrectly carried out on the spreadsheet and not noticed by anyone until nearly two years later.

The agreed-to version of this trade moved $15 from Schexes to Patrick in 2025. That transaction was never carried out on the spreadsheet, though, and the error was not noticed by anyone until over a year later.

playerCorrections.name: Steve Smith
playerCorrections.notes: Panthers, not the Eagles Steve Smith
